channel.title: Literature on The Portal of Knowledge
channel.description: Recent content in Literature on The Portal of Knowledge

item.title: Greek poetry set to music
item.description: This video was made by me in 2008. It is a collection of extracts of greek poems set to music by various greek artists.

item.title: Χελωνολαγομαχίες (available in greek only)
item.description: A turtle VS rabbit story. This story is available only in greek.
